name: ANTARSMARTHOMES
0:
”Alexa, turn on Living room light”
”Alexa, turn on Kitchen light”
”Alexa, turn off Kitchen light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: With "ANTAR SMART HOMES" skill and Alexa you can now control your home lighting, Colors, Scenes, and much more hands-free using echo devices. Use this skill to discover and interact with your household appliances connected to Antar smart homes range of home automation switches. You must be a registered customer with Antar smart homes and should be having an Amazon account to use this skill. The Skill is currently supported by ANTAR SMART HOMES 8X,4X,2X,1X,1X Pro and X-Colors switches
